projects.title: Game Time Analyzer
projects.description: This project leverages Python and Pandas to analyze and visualize video game playtime data, providing insights into gaming habits and trends across different platforms.

services.title: Medical Interpretation (Spanish-English)
services.description: With 2 years of experience in virtual medical interpretation, I provide accurate and professional Spanish-English interpretation services. I assist in facilitating clear communication between medical professionals and patients, ensuring that medical information is understood and conveyed accurately.

aboutpara:
Hi! I'm Sofia Rodr√≠guez, a passionate and curious Informatics Engineering student at the Universidad Americana de Asunci√≥n. I come from a background in medical interpretation, where I developed strong communication, multitasking, and problem-solving skills while working with companies like Propio, Voyce, and Epicus.

Lately, I've been diving deeper into the world of tech‚Äîparticularly Python, data analysis with Pandas, automation, and web development. I'm currently learning React through a course called Deep Dive Into Modern Web Development, and I‚Äôve already started building small projects, like automating messages using Pandas and Twilio.

Right now, I'm looking for new opportunities where I can bring my technical skills, enthusiasm, and adaptability to a team that values growth and innovation. I‚Äôm especially interested in roles where I can continue building my experience with automation, customer support, or web development.

resume.tagline: I'm a medical interpreter and pursuing a master's in Computer Engineering
resume.description: I'm a medical interpreter, helping bridge communication between healthcare professionals and patients. At the same time, I'm pursuing a master's degree in Computer Engineering, where I aim to merge my passion for technology with my experience in communication.

experiences.bullets: As a remote medical interpreter with Propio, I provided high-quality Spanish-English interpretation services in a variety of medical settings. My role involved facilitating communication between patients and healthcare professionals, ensuring accuracy and cultural sensitivity in delivering medical information. With over 2 years of experience, I have developed strong skills in medical terminology and client interaction, contributing to better healthcare outcomes for non-English speaking patients.

During my time at Voyce, I worked as a remote medical interpreter, providing accurate and effective Spanish-English interpretation services. I bridged communication gaps between healthcare providers and patients in a range of medical settings, ensuring the delivery of precise medical information. My experience with Voyce allowed me to hone my skills in medical terminology and patient interaction, making a significant impact on the quality of care for non-English speaking individuals.
